Articles.Content:
H

Hello all of you ,noble and good Kerbals of Ksp world !

I am just a casual beginner not totally clueless due to a lot of lurking in the wiki and in the forums.I play actually vanilla ksp ,one day i will face my fear

and install some.

My space program is going well , Mun and Minmus are kerbal studied in situ ( only with direct ascent  or ease)

And probe have been sent well in Moho,Eve,Duna and finally inside Jool.

One day i will come back when i will very wanting to be initiated in the arcane knowing of rendez-vous and coupling and of course some simple to install graphics mod.

What a game !

See you all !

Come in to our fine community, lurker.

We are generally happy to share all of the arcane knowledge we possess.

Happy landings!
